refbody.section:
This plugin was developed and tested with DITA-OT 3.7.3. To guarantee that this plugin works, the following versions are required:
DITA-OT 3.7.x
Java 1.8.x or higher The plugin can be used with a default version of the DITA-OT or a customized DITA-OT version with specialized document type definitions and modified transformation scenarios.
